body_html: @F3PiX I'm not so much concerned about which format we go for (I've never heard of .tsv before, but that doesn't mean anything 🙃 ). I took it from your conversation that Google Docs exported the same data with different column seperators, once with semicolon (that you used for implementing the feature) and now with comma. Or was the first one (with semicolon) not exported from Google Docs?
